metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7945 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low
metadata.Description:
Multiple integer overflows in X.org libXi before 1.7.7 allow remote Xservers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds memory access orinfinite loop) via vectors involving length fields.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7945` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxi6 - 2:1.7.8-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libxi package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:1.7.8-1').
